name: Dungeon Divers (CoachCarter9)
description:
WASD move.

Q/E To Rotate tile

Press Space to move to current location. Movement is limited to your dexterity attribute.

Press Return to confirm tile placement(must be connecting to a tile).

Get the artifact, obtain the most points and escape the dungeon before it's deadly traps claim you forever!

Known Issues:

Game does not notify you of an incorrect placement.
